Text: 80zforever, I have to agree with you in fact It has always amazed me how many bands from that time that were great and never made it. Just re dicovered Dectetive and Silverhead and ask my self why? Keep up the great work and if you want to expand into the 70's you have my vote Cheers and happy Canada Day!!

The8Ts, these are two different bands. The 3-D you mentioned had a few singles. The band fronted by Jon Corner  (Vocals, Bass & Sax)
John Reynolds (Lead Guitar & Backing Vocals)
Steve Spurgin (Keyboards & Backing Vocals). They were from the UK and released only the songs you stated. Their songs were produced by Hayes and Nocito who later formed Johnny Hates Jazz with Clark Datchler.

The8Ts, I used to have The Reluctant Stereotypes lp but since I was never a big fan of Ska, I let it go somehow. However I remember I saw it posted in the blog of Marco On The Bass. Just google it and see if the link is still there.
I have all the Rare 80's Albums that you've upped! This is great...Thank you so much!
Thanks! I have not had a chance to listen to everything you have uploaded but I will tell you this I have yet to be disappointed with an upload.  If you continue to post I will continue to listen :)
that should say have yet to be disappointed with an upload
